title: Sell Coche-Dury
metaTitle: Sell Coche-Dury Wine | Corton-Charlemagne, Meursault | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Coche-Dury wines. We buy Corton-Charlemagne, Meursault Perrieres, and Rouge. Direct offers for rare White Burgundy.
heroSubhead: We buy Coche-Dury Corton-Charlemagne and Meursault.
introParagraph: Jean-François Coche-Dury is a cult figure in Burgundy, producing white wines of extraordinary longevity and demand. We purchase the rare Corton-Charlemagne, the premier cru Meursault Perrières, and even the village-level Meursaults which often outperform Grand Crus from other estates.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bourgogne Aligoté (unless part of larger lot)
Prematurely oxidized bottles (rare for Coche, but checked)
conditionFactors: Color (Golden color is normal for old Coche, but brown suggests oxidation)

faqs.question: Is Coche-Dury Meursault valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, even the 'Village' Meursault from Coche-Dury is more valuable than most Grand Crus from other producers.

faqs.question: Do you buy Coche-Dury Rouge?
faqs.answer: Yes, while famous for whites, his reds from Volnay and Auxey-Duresses are also collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Aligoté?
faqs.answer: We buy the Aligoté if it is part of a larger collection of Coche wines.

faqs.question: Is premox an issue?
faqs.answer: Coche-Dury is famously resistant to premature oxidation, making older vintages highly reliable and valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy Roulot or Lafon?
faqs.answer: Yes, we also buy wines from Domaine Roulot and Comtes Lafon.

faqs.question: How do I sell my cellar?
faqs.answer: Send us a list using our 'Get an Offer' page or simply email us photos.
